body_html:
@shaurya0 I have upstreamed some changes to make it possible to build tfcompile on Windows via Bazel, tracking bug at #15213, instruction at https://github.com/rongjiecomputer/tensorflow-xla-aot-windows. Very hacky as I need to build LLVM with CMake then import the binaries to Tensorflow to build with Bazel

If you can port the Bazel build script of XLA/AOT to CMake, it will be possible to build LLVM and Tensorflow together. I can't do/test this as I cannot use CMake + MSBuild, and Tensorflow can't be built with CMake + Ninja.

body:
@shaurya0 I have upstreamed some changes to make it possible to build tfcompile on Windows via Bazel, tracking bug at #15213, instruction at https://github.com/rongjiecomputer/tensorflow-xla-aot-windows. Very hacky as I need to build LLVM with CMake then import the binaries to Tensorflow to build with Bazel

If you can port the Bazel build script of XLA/AOT to CMake, it will be possible to build LLVM and Tensorflow together. I can't do/test this as I cannot use CMake + MSBuild, and Tensorflow can't be built with CMake + Ninja.
